Title: Scientific and research work of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Part of an 11-poster series, "Scientific and research work of New China" (新中国的科学研究工作), published in 1952.Titled "Survey of the natural conditions and resources of the nation" (祖国自然条件和资源的调查), it shows a work team researching scientific, cultural, and social phenomena, active in Tibet since 1951.
